songs.title: Heavy Hitter
songs.lyrics:
[Verse 1]
I was loungin' at the Chateau Marmont
Glimmerin' by the swimmin' pool
My man walked in like a slow-motion movie
I said, "You're so cool"

[Pre-Chorus 1]
I heard a man screamin', "Lights, camera, action!"
I c-c-can't remember what happened
I overdose, you throw me over your shoulder
I was dyin', you were screamin'
"Open up that Lamborghini"

[Chorus]
Open up your butterfly doors
(Heavy hitter)
Open up your butterfly doors
(What do you say?)
Open up your butterfly doors
(Heavy hitter)
Let's ch-ch-change our DNA
Let's change our DNA

[Verse 2]
You're the king mafia baby
I'm the Queen of Alchemy
I know a way to make gold
By mixin' our souls to escape reality

[Pre-Chorus 2]
Me and Monterrey went to that ocean
I got that magical trance potion
Gotta leave, I can't wait 'til I'm older
You was laughin', I was runnin'
Use that remote to open up

[Chorus]
Open up your butterfly doors
(Heavy hitter)
Open up your butterfly doors
(What do you say?)
Open up your butterfly doors
(Heavy hitter)
Let's ch-ch-change our DNA
Let's change our DNA

[Bridge]
You can be my higher power, baby
I can be your endless USA
We can go on drives for hours, baby
Let's cha-a-ange our DNA
Let's change our DNA
Let's change

[Chorus]
Open up your butterfly doors
(Heavy hitter)
Open up your butterfly doors
(What do you say?)
Open up your butterfly doors
(Heavy hitter)
Let's ch-ch-change our DNA
Let's change our DNA

[Outro]
Heavy hitter
